description: The investor Warren Buffett appeared at a rally with Hillary Clinton on Monday in Omaha, sharply criticizing her Republican opponent, Donald J. Trump.
title: Warren Buffett Chastises Trump
title_page: Warren Buffett Chastises Trump - Video - NYTimes.com
text: The investor Warren Buffett appeared at a rally with Hillary Clinton on Monday in Omaha, sharply criticizing her Republican opponent, Donald J. Trump.
